items.name: ServiceRadar
items.description: ServiceRadar is an open-source, distributed network monitoring system designed for security and performance in constrained or hard-to-reach environments. It uses a zero-trust architecture with lightweight agents to provide real-time monitoring, alerting, and network discovery.

items.name: Orb Community
items.description: Orb is an open-source observability platform that provides a unified view of metrics, logs, and traces. It aims to simplify the complexities of observability by offering an integrated solution for monitoring and troubleshooting distributed systems.

items.name: Elastic Stack (ELK)
items.description: Elastic Stack, formerly known as ELK Stack, is a group of open source products from Elastic designed to help users take data from any type of source and in any format and search, analyze, and visualize it in real time.

items.name: Datadog
items.description: Datadog is a monitoring and analytics platform for large-scale applications. It brings together data from servers, containers, databases, and third-party services to make your stack entirely observable.

items.name: Splunk
items.description: Splunk [a Cisco company] is a software platform for searching, monitoring, and analyzing machine-generated big data, via a web-style interface. It captures, indexes, and correlates real-time data in a searchable repository, from which it can generate graphs, reports, alerts, dashboards, and visualizations.

items.name: Icinga
items.description: Monitoring system which checks the availability of your network resources, notifies users of outages, and generates performance data for reporting.

items.name: LibreNMS
items.description: A fully featured network monitoring system that provides a wealth of features and device support.

items.name: eNMS
items.description: eNMS is a vendor-agnostic NMS designed for building workflow-based network automation solutions, with a focus on visualization, inventory management, and service scheduling.

items.name: Observium
items.description: Observium is a network monitoring platform supporting a wide range of device types, platforms and operating systems.

items.name: Prometheus
items.description: An open-source systems monitoring and alerting toolkit, popular in cloud-native environments but also very applicable to network monitoring.

items.name: Grafana
items.description: The open source graphical analytics & monitoring solution default. Often used in conjunction with Prometheus for network monitoring visualization.

items.name: Zabbix
items.description: An enterprise-class open source distributed monitoring solution for networks and applications.

items.name: Netos NetOps
items.description: Built with Ansible Semaphore, the Netos NetOps project lays the foundation to install and manage NetBox, and other network tools.
